product_name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Pants - Men's Tall Sizes
long_description: Delivering waterproof, insulated performance to keep you dry and warm, The North Face Freedom insulated pants are made for your winter adventures and offer a long inseam for a great, long-legged fit. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. 60g Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation helps keep young legs warm while you're romping about in the snow; insulation packs down easily for compact stowing of pants. Pants have a long inseam length and a relaxed fit with articulated knees for excellent freedom of movement. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly. Zippered handwarmer pockets; single thigh cargo pocket. The North Face Freedom Insulated pants feature reinforced cuffs that resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis.
short_description: Delivering waterproof, insulated performance to keep you dry and warm, The North Face Freedom insulated pants are made for your winter adventures and offer a long inseam for a great, long-legged fit.
